resources.string:
• To facilitate community recording of tenure rights using crowd sourcing approach 
• Mobile Device software for field capture and display of tenure rights and associated reference map imagery 
• Web based Community Server for community moderation of tenure claims community accessible

\n Maps the extent of the tenure rights using the mobile device and the downloaded map imagery assisted with GPS positions provided by mobile device. \n When complete a map of the claim can be generated and added to the claim
\n Details about the person making the claim on behalf of others or themselves including name, date of birth, gender, ID details and photo

• Shows the list of SLTR Claims 
• Each claim has a lifecycle and transition to different states as the claim is processed 
• A claim can be selected from the list to enter/see details on claim and mark up the extent of the tenure rights 
• A new claim can be entered by clicking
Select an existing Claim from the list to edit its details or ...
\n Details about Claim including name, tenure right, land use, date that right started and any notes about the claim

Search Icon 
 Lock Icon 
 Setting Icon
\n Click on the Add Claim Icon to add new claim

Save Icon 
 Upload Icon 
 Print Icon

Rotate Icon 
 Center Icon 
 Attach Snapshot Icon
